verbose_text: Other important pathways include p300 / CBP, which promotes androgen independent IL-6 mediated AR activation in the presence of STAT3, and LSD1 and JMJD2c, lysine demethylases that demethylate the histone H3 proteins and lead to increased AR induced transcription.
evidence: LSD1 and JMJD2c, lysine demethylases that demethylate the histone H3 proteins and lead to increased AR induced transcription
